Sentencas: Four compositions in the BaO-Al2O3-SiO2 system modified with B2O3 were investigated with regard to their use as glassy seals in anode supported SOFC or iT-SOFC.
Titulo: Glass ceramic sealants belonging to BAS (BaO-Al2O3-SiO2) ternary system modified with B2O3 addition: A different approach to access the SOFC seal issue

Sentencas: The glassy system studied contains varying percentages of SiO2, Al2O3, B2O3, and high content of BaO as modifier (67-74%-wt).
Titulo: Glass ceramic sealants belonging to BAS (BaO-Al2O3-SiO2) ternary system modified with B2O3 addition: A different approach to access the SOFC seal issue

Sentencas: Their glass transition (Tg) and maximum densification point lies between 630 and 680 degrees C, and 734 degrees C to 828 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Glass ceramic sealants belonging to BAS (BaO-Al2O3-SiO2) ternary system modified with B2O3 addition: A different approach to access the SOFC seal issue

Sentencas: The viscosities of the four glasses are situated between 107 to 1095 Pa.s, in the sealing range (730-830 degrees C).
Titulo: Glass ceramic sealants belonging to BAS (BaO-Al2O3-SiO2) ternary system modified with B2O3 addition: A different approach to access the SOFC seal issue

Sentencas: Heat treatment at 850 degrees C, revealed crystalline phases identified as BaAl2Si2O8 (hexacelsian) and BaSiO3.
Titulo: Glass ceramic sealants belonging to BAS (BaO-Al2O3-SiO2) ternary system modified with B2O3 addition: A different approach to access the SOFC seal issue

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) of the obtained glasses (8.8-10.5 ppm/K) was comparable to zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte, and shows chemical compatibility and high characteristic bond strength (up to 33 7 MPa).
Titulo: Glass ceramic sealants belonging to BAS (BaO-Al2O3-SiO2) ternary system modified with B2O3 addition: A different approach to access the SOFC seal issue

Sentencas: The compositions with higher BaO content in the system studied seem to be good candidates for iT-SOFC sealant application.
Titulo: Glass ceramic sealants belonging to BAS (BaO-Al2O3-SiO2) ternary system modified with B2O3 addition: A different approach to access the SOFC seal issue
